alert.note: Alert for Erath; Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Erath and south central Palo Pinto Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gordon, or 15 miles east of Ranger, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Lake Palo Pinto, Strawn, Mingus, Thurber and Hannibal. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 364 and 377. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
